skilllist.skilldesc:
Gatotkaca gains Physical Defense equal to 2% of his lost HP (up to 200). For every 300 damage he takes (calculated before damage reduction), he gains 5 Rage (up to 100).

Upon reaching over 25 Rage, Gatotkaca's next Basic Attack becomes enhanced, consuming all Rage to deal extra <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and recover HP. The extra damage scales with his Rage, level, and Magic Power.

Gatotkaca slams the ground, creating a shattered zone in the target direction while dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within. Enemies in the shattered zone will take 100<font color="62f8fe"> (+20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> per second and be slowed by 30%.

Gatotkaca begins channeling, then sprints in the target direction with a battle cry, forcing enemies on the path to attack him and deal 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> for 1.5s. The sprint distance scales with the channel time. Canceling the Skill reduces 50% of the remaining Cooldown.

Gatotkaca jumps to the target location, dealing 500<font color="62f8fe"> (+300% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies and knocking them airborne for 1s. Enemies near the center of the area will be knocked airborne for a longer duration, while enemies on the fringes will be pulled to the center.

The camera will move with the skill indicator but won't grant extra sight.

__data.skilldesc: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldesc_text: For <Num1>s, gain <%Num3> [C2Damage Reduction] and deal <%Num2> [C1Magic Damage] back to the attacker each time you receive damage.
__data.skilldescemblem: For 3s, gain 35% <font color="62f8fe">Damage Reduction</font> and deal 35% <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> back to the attacker each time you receive damage.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: Take and deal damage with Physical & Magic Defense equipment in the late game.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: When HP is below <%Num1>, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by <Num2>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: When HP is below 50%, Physical & Magic Defense are increased by 15.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+0.07 Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: After the next Basic Attack, deal <Num1> Magic Damage to nearby enemies.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
After the next Basic Attack, deal 100(+7% Total HP) Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Passive - Dire Hit: The next attack against enemy heroes below 35% HP deals 7-18% of their Max HP as extra Hybrid Damage (half Magic and half Physical).
equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Dire Hit: The next attack against enemy heroes below 35% HP deals 7-18% of their Max HP as extra Hybrid Damage (half Magic and half Physical).
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equiplist.equipskill1:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Thunderbolt: Every 4s, the next Basic Attack deals 50<font color="26e407"> (+1 Extra Physical Defense)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+1 Extra Magic Defense)</font> extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them, and briefly slows them by 99%. Hybrid Defense permanently increases by 1 each time the attack hits an enemy hero.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect is reduced to 50% for Marksmen and Mages.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense
+15 Extra Magic Defense
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Holy Blessing: Taking Magic Damage grants 5(+1*Hero Level) Magic Defense for 5s, up to 6 stacks (can only gain 1 stack(s) every 0.6s).
equiplist.equiptips:
+950 Extra Max HP
+40 Extra Magic Defense
+12 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 30% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus <font color="26e407"> (+0.2 Total Physical Defense)</font> to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+20% Crit Damage Reduction
+70 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: AI.Rexx
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Gatotkaca works best with heroes with strong CC and damage, such as Kagura and Vale who can give his Ultimate even more value.

strong.desc: Due to his great CC and high Physical Defense, Gatotkaca counters Marksmen with no mobility skills like Layla and Popol and Kupa..

weak.desc: Gatotkaca is countered by heroes that can remove CC like Diggie and Wanwan who will greatly reduce his effectiveness.
